snippet: Fighters who oppose the government of President Bashar al-Assad and the Islamic State are being pummeled by a new wave of attacks and assassination attempts.
abstract: Syrian government appears to be stepping up its attacks on insurgents of all stripes ahead of threatened American air campaign against Islamic State militants.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and MOHAMMAD GHANNAM

lead_paragraph: Fighters who oppose the government of President Bashar al-Assad and the Islamic State are being pummeled by a new wave of attacks and assassination attempts.

headline.main: Syrian Forces Are Seen Stepping Up Attacks on Rebels as U.S. Sets Sights on ISIS
headline.print_headline: Syrian Forces Are Seen Stepping Up Attacks on Rebels as U.S. Sets Sights on ISIS
